sense.def: Etiological Agent. identical with dan shi du 丹石毒 , cinnabar [et al.] mineral poison. Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 Substance Entry feng 蚌：壓丹石藥毒 , “To suppress cinnabar [et al.] mineral drug poison ”. Dan shi yao fa 丹石藥發 outbreak of cinnabar [et al.] mineral drug [poisoning] [2] Pathological Condition identical with dan shi du fa 丹石毒發 , outbreak of cinnabar [et al.] mineral poisoning. Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 Substance Entry qu mai 瞿麥：丹石藥發並眼目腫痛及腫毒，搗傅 , “To [treat] an outbreak of cinnabar [et al.] mineral drug [poisoning] associated with swollen and aching eyes, and swelling [because of] poison, grind and apply externally”.
